titleStmt.title: The true copies of sundrie letters concerning the affaires of Bohemia, as they haue beene seuerally writen in High Dutch, Latine and French, to princes, and other men of account. Newly translated and printed
titleStmt.author: Saincte Foy, François de.
Christian II, Elector of Saxony, 1583-1611.
Bethlen, Gábor, Prince of Transylvania, 1580-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby? or William Jones?],

notesStmt.note: Includes letters by François de Saincte Foy; Christian II, Elector of Saxony; Bethlen Gábor, Prince of Transylvania; and an unidentified author.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
